sentences.en: A black coat always looks smart and will never date.
sentences.cn: 黑色外套看起来总是很潇洒，而且永远也不会落伍。

sentences.en: a smart black suit
sentences.cn: 漂亮的黑色套装

sentences.en: come up here, and look smart about it!.
sentences.cn: 到这来，快点！。

sentences.en: He did right smart of the work himself.
sentences.cn: 他亲自完成了工作的一大部份

sentences.en: He found her as smart and beautiful as she is charming.
sentences.cn: 他感觉她聪明漂亮，又讨人喜欢。

sentences.en: He is street smart and is not afraid of this neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 他有都市人的精明劲儿，不怕在这附近混。

sentences.en: He was a smart operator. Don't underestimate him.
sentences.cn: 他这个人精明圆滑，可别小瞧了他。

sentences.en: He was smart and well groomed but not good looking.
sentences.cn: 他仪容整洁，穿戴漂亮，就是人长得不好看。

sentences.en: He's no rube. He's a very smart guy.
sentences.cn: 他可不是什么土包子。他非常聪明。

sentences.en: He'susually smart in his dress.
sentences.cn: 他通常穿得很精神。

sentences.en: His decision to become a director was a smart move (= sensible thing to do ) .
sentences.cn: 他决定要做导演，这是明智之举。

sentences.en: I guess she thought that was pretty smart.
sentences.cn: 我想她可能认为那个很漂亮。

sentences.en: I spent lots of money on smart new outfits for work.
sentences.cn: 我花大笔钱购置了上班时穿的漂亮新套装。

sentences.en: I was smart enough to wait for a week.
sentences.cn: 我很明智，等了一个星期。

sentences.en: Investors are playing it cautious, and they're playing it smart.
sentences.cn: 投资者审慎精明地行事。

sentences.en: Laura landed a plum job with a smart art gallery.
sentences.cn: 劳拉在一家时尚画廊找到了份美差。

sentences.en: My eyes were smarting with the smoke.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛被烟熏得发痛。

sentences.en: Smart country people are fleeing back to the shires.
sentences.cn: 精明的乡下人正纷纷逃回各郡。

sentences.en: smart new offices
sentences.cn: 整洁漂亮的新办公室

sentences.en: The kitchen has smart black tiling, worksurfaces and cupboards.
sentences.cn: 厨房有漂亮的黑色瓷砖地面、操作台面和碗橱。

sentences.en: The smart kids get good grades and go off to college.
sentences.cn: 聪明的孩子成绩好，可以去上大学。

sentences.en: They were smart but not showy.
sentences.cn: 他们衣着讲究但不惹眼。

sentences.en: Winter spas are now the smart set's choice for serious R&R.
sentences.cn: 冬季温泉是当下时髦人士体验真正的休息娱乐的的首选。

words.tran_cn: 刺痛地；漂亮地；潇洒地；火辣辣地
感到刺痛；感到难受（smart的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 小灵通（中国网通和中国电信联合推出的移动通信产品）

phrases.phrase: right smart&I{【新英格兰】} &I{【美国南部】}
phrases.tran_cn: 很多：许多；一个很大的数量
抚恤金；罚款；因掌握内情而下的赌注；（英）伤兵抚恤
无礼：没有礼貌地说话或行动
n. 熟悉都市生活方式和世态的；街头智慧

trans.tran_en: to feel a sharp stinging pain in a part of your body
